note.p: Death: His father's house at Brompton, Kent (31 January 1849)

Career: Secretary, Chemical Society; Lecturer in Chemistry, Pharmaceutical Society; Lecturer in Chemistry, Medical School, Middlesex Hospital; Professor of Practical Chemistry, University of London (to 1849);
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1849 No 74 pp 882-883
References: N G Coley, 'Henry Bence-Jones, MD, FRS (1813-1873)' in NR 1973-4 vol 28 pp 31-56
